entries.name: each_strongly_connected_component(each_node, each_child)
entries.desc: The iterator version of the #strongly_connected_components method.

entries.name: each_strongly_connected_component_from(node, each_child, id_map={}, stack=[])
entries.desc: Iterates over strongly connected components in a graph. The graph is represented by node and each_child.

entries.name: strongly_connected_components(each_node, each_child)
entries.desc: Returns strongly connected components as an array of arrays of nodes. The array is sorted from children to parents. Each elements of the array represents a strongly connected component.

entries.name: tsort(each_node, each_child)
entries.desc: Returns a topologically sorted array of nodes. The array is sorted from children to parents, i.e. the first element has no child and the last node has no parent.

entries.name: tsort_each(each_node, each_child)
entries.desc: The iterator version of the #tsort method.

entries.name: each_strongly_connected_component()
entries.desc: The iterator version of the strongly_connected_components method. obj.each_strongly_connected_component is similar to obj.strongly_connected_components.each, but modification of obj during the iteration may lead to unexpected results.

entries.name: each_strongly_connected_component_from(node, id_map={}, stack=[])
entries.desc: Iterates over strongly connected component in the subgraph reachable from node.

entries.name: strongly_connected_components()
entries.desc: Returns strongly connected components as an array of arrays of nodes. The array is sorted from children to parents. Each elements of the array represents a strongly connected component.

entries.name: tsort()
entries.desc: Returns a topologically sorted array of nodes. The array is sorted from children to parents, i.e. the first element has no child and the last node has no parent.

entries.name: tsort_each()
entries.desc: The iterator version of the tsort method. obj.tsort_each is similar to obj.tsort.each, but modification of obj during the iteration may lead to unexpected results.

entries.name: tsort_each_child(node)
entries.desc: Should be implemented by a extended class.

entries.name: tsort_each_node()
entries.desc: Should be implemented by a extended class.
